Name: Space raven quest - Tiny planet
About the game: A bird-like humanoid had to land his spaceship on an unknown planet. There is some information reaffirming that the planet is inhabited and has the resources needed to continue the flight. An old school quest with pixel hunting like games from studio Lucas Arts. Features: 1) Hand-drawn 2d graphical design styled like old cartoons from the '90s; 2) A great amount of references to movies and literature; 3) Morbid humor, including religious topics.
